file_content.text: [You use the console to switch off power to the ray shield blocking the exit.]
[It appears the Republic explorers fashioned an improvised distress beacon from scavenged equipment.]
[The surviving explorers are in bad shape and will never make it off of Athiss unless the beacon is activated.]
[You activate the distress beacon, ensuring that the surviving explorers will be rescued.]
[You destroy the distress beacon, ensuring that the corruption affecting the explorers never leaves Athiss and the Republic explorers are never heard from again.]
[You use the console to switch off power to the ray shield blocking the exit.]
[It appears the Republic explorers fashioned an improvised distress beacon from scavenged equipment.]

[The surviving explorers are in bad shape and will never make it off of Athiss unless the beacon is activated. If they leave the planet, however, it risks the corruption that infects them spreading across the galaxy.]
[You activate the distress beacon, ensuring that the surviving explorers will be rescued.]
[You destroy the distress beacon, ensuring that the corruption affecting the explorers never leaves Athiss.]
